net.powermatcher.api.data

Class ArrayBid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.api.data.Bid
      • net.powermatcher.api.data.ArrayBid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregatedBid

    public class ArrayBid
extends Bid
    This immutable data object represents a Bid with a double demand array to represent the bid curve. This is used because it is easy to perform calculations with.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      A builder class to create an ArrayBid instance.

    • Method Detail

      • aggregate

        public ArrayBid aggregate(Bid other)
        Aggregates this Bid instance with another Bid. Bid are aggregated by adding their bid curves.
        Specified by:
        aggregate in class Bid
        Parameters:
        other - The Bid whose bid curve has to be added to the bid curve of this instance.
        Returns:
        A new aggregated Bid.

        Parameters:

      • getDemandAt

        public double getDemandAt(PriceStep priceStep)
        Calculates the demand at the intersection with the bid curve at the given PriceStep. Implementation note: you should always override either this method or the Bid.getDemandAt(Price) method. The default implementation is to call the other.
        Overrides:
        getDemandAt in class Bid
        Parameters:
        priceStep - the PriceStep you want to know the demand of.
        Returns:
        the calculated demand

      • subtract

        public ArrayBid subtract(ArrayBid other)
        Subtract the other bid curve from this bid curve. Subtract is the inverse of aggregate. The other bid does not have to be based on the same market basis.
        Parameters:
        other - The other (Bid) parameter.
        Returns:
        A copy of this bid with the other bid subtracted from it.

      • transpose

        public ArrayBid transpose(double offset)
        Transpose the bid curve by adding an offset to the demand.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (double) parameter.
        Returns:
        The ArrayBid that has been shifted.
